metadata.title: CVE-2022-33099 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
An issue in the component luaG_runerror of Lua v5.4.4 and below leads to aheap-buffer overflow when a recursive error occurs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-33099` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.4-3
lua5.4 - 5.4.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.4-3').
